short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces spaced links on X (Twitter) with actual clickable links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of seeing links on X (formerly Twitter) that aren’t clickable because they’re spaced out? This extension automatically converts those spaced-out URLs into fully clickable hyperlinks, saving you the hassle of copying and pasting. Perfect for improving your browsing experience, making it easier to access shared content with just a click. No more broken links or manual corrections—just seamless navigation.
